snippet.title: How To Die : A Hope Beneath Trailer
snippet.description:
Prepare to die in the most bizarre ways possible in How To Die: A Hope Beneath. Take on the role of a mysterious cube that finds itself in a dark cave, where the only way out is to jump to your death. In this dark puzzle platformer by Shireishi Productions, you must solve increasingly absurd puzzles to achieve your goal: death.

Explore four unique chapters, each with its own theme and level design that will test your puzzle-solving skills. With mechanics and puzzles that are unlike any other, you'll need to think creatively to find ways to end your existence.

But not everything is as it seems. As you progress through the levels, you'll slowly discover why you're in this strange world and unravel the mysteries surrounding your past. Death by getting sliced in half, death by getting run over by a truck, How to Die may be dark in its setting, but it certainly does not lack a healthy dose of wackiness.

How To Die: A Hope Beneath is coming to Steam in 2023, and you can get a taste of what's to come by downloading the demo today. So get ready to die in the most bizarre ways possible and unravel the mysteries surrounding your existence in How To Die: A Hope Beneath.

Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2226210/How_to_Die__A_Hope_Beneath/
